Contact

It can be tough making friends in college...

Make friends with other students at your university using Featherr. Featherr is only available at the University of Nebraska at Omaha (for now).

Get on App Store Get on Play Store

Chat with friends

Once Featherr is downloaded, you will be placed into up to 4 small chat groups with everyone else being from the same university. We will also let you know when there are events on your campus to encourage you to meet at your university. Soon, we will be grouping people based on compatibility using scores from a personality test. For now, groups will be sorted randomly.

Feed

There is also a feed where you can join topic groups related to your interests where you can post and talk with others from the same university who like the same stuff. This way, you can get to know a lot more people you have something in common with you wouldn't have known otherwise.

Download the app today

on iOS and Android
